Text:
@ Quazza 

please consider cross posting to usenet

jBinUo directly supports SSL
I have no idea how to post to usenet.

with a usenet provider, RAR the files into segments that are a multiple of 384000 bytes.  Add a job to jbinup with your RAR files.  click upload.  Only the bandwidth to transfer the files ONCE.  Optionally create Par2 volumes with QuickPAR
files posted to usenet do NOT require seeds... files don't die because of selfish assholes
